name: nuclide-related-files
description: Allows jumping between related files in a project (e.g. header/source files)
author: NEEDS OWNER

openInNextPane.title: Open related files in next open pane
openInNextPane.description: Open related files (i.e. switch to header/source) in the next open pane.

fileTypeWhitelist.title: Whitelist of files types to switch between
fileTypeWhitelist.description: Comma-separated list of file types to switch between
